Shady Records' group Slaughterhouse is having a live chat tonight at 9PM EST on sign on and ask some questions!
Australia, I'm on the way. Tickets still available for Sydney Dec. 4th show:
Ok I'm out!
Q10- If u could play for any person in the world, who would it be?
Q9 - R u going to the mall later?
Q8 - Now they said to ask some stupid ones. Batman or Superman?
Q7 - Why did you call it ?
Q6 - Who or what inspired you the most while recording ?
Q5 - Really? Why is that your favorite?
Q4 - Sure did. What song from is your favorite?
Q3 - ok white dawg. So when did you start recording ?
Q2 - U are a true fan. How's it feel to finally have out there?
Q1 - Where you at celebrating the release of ?
OK, here go my questions to . Ready?
I'll be asking some questions here about today at 4pm EST/1pm PST...
